That, along with the speed and absolutely no fan noise or any type of noise, it's a treat!  And a GREAT buy!

Reviews.Title: Thoughts!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Torres
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a device that is a laptop and aren't wanting to waste a lot of money! Well this is the solution to your problem!

Reviews.Title: Very Good Buy for secondary computer
Reviews.Author: Patrick Murphy
Reviews.Content: It works well for what I need it for. I already have a desktop and just wanted something mobile with web access that I can write papers and make presentations on. I would not recommend it as the primary computer one owns though; it can't download any program of significance (unless you convert it to Linix, but that has its own problems) and its offline functionality is severely limited. Overall a good computer though, just make sure its what you want.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Momi
Reviews.Content: Purchased my first laptop ever.Great ever since the first day i got it. No problems at all. I recommend it to all first time buyers:) Sound quality is good and so is the camera.Battery life is awesome and surprisingly long.

Reviews.Title: Just wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Alan P. Dutcher "alzie"
Reviews.Content: The HW is great, batt life is great, and it boots fast.It has every thing that i need in a note book.How ever, i was under whelmed by ChromeOS.Its totally dead off line.I really need to use it off line.Sooo, the other reason i bought it is thatthe hacker hobbyist people have ported Bodhi Linux to run on it.I have installed it, and now the unit can be completely stand alone.I m a very happy camper!I highly recommend the C720.

Reviews.Title: bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: carson
Reviews.Content: I have this device and it is def a bang for your dollat. It isnt the fastest one out there but for what you pay you get value for every cent.

Reviews.Title: bought it for my boyfriend, who LOVES it so far
Great product
Reviews.Author: Mogens Wassermann
Reviews.Content: Works as I had hoped, for the money I thought it was the best option. Great screen resolution, size is great, good for daily use, Netflix etc.

Reviews.Title: Best Chromebook with the acceptable price!
Reviews.Author: Trien
Reviews.Content: The purchase of this product isn't waste my money. This Chromebook's very usable and very fast for me! But the throwback is it not provide enough application to run offline. Instead, all the web application require you to run online. It seems like you must always stick with the internet. One more thing, the web application will not satisfy you enough compare to the full application in Windows. If you want to continue to love your Chromebook, you must learn how to adapt in this situation. In my opinion, I think it's the fastest Chromebook compare to the others and also the price is cheap for you in order to try the future technologies (Cloud service).

Reviews.Title: Could not be more pleased
Reviews.Author: Mystery Reader
Reviews.Content: I had been a Mac user for nearly six years before my MacBook decided it wanted to be put to pasture.  The computer worked great; the battery not so much.  Since I started working almost exclusively with Google Drive, I decided that I had to check out a Chromebook and the Acer 720 came up as the most popular.There is a reason for this.  It could not be a better bang for your buck.I love everything about it.  The size, weight, how far the screen tilts, boot time, comparability with every file I took off my Mac.  It performs so well that I can't figure out why they don't give them to kids at school.  I'm trying to raise the cash for one for my 7-year-old as we speak.Do yourself a favor.  If you just need the Internet and to be able to write, watch YouTube and maybe play a game, get this Chromebook.

Reviews.Title: great laptop love it!
Reviews.Author: Carolina Zuluaga
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Nothing fancy, great use to browse the web,  use all Google features.  Light weight, great battery life. It's all I needed

Reviews.Title: Awesome Laptop
Reviews.Author: Keith Oshea
Reviews.Content: Light, long battery life and easy to use. I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a travel laptop, or a work laptop, its great for on the go work.

Reviews.Title: Still adapting to Chrome, but...
Reviews.Author: pfaff quilter
Reviews.Content: it's so quick without all that Windows stuff tying up your computer.  I still need to figure out how to use a lot of features and where I can store documents, but I'll get there.  Very light weight, small, good screen.

Reviews.Title: Acer C720 Chromebook (11.6-Inch, 2GB)
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with this little machine, especially for the price.  It is a great little internet machine.  Super simple to operate and the Chrome OS is very intuitive.  I would highly recommend this device for someone who is interested in surfing the net, social media and email.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this Chromebook! It is so easy to set up. When there are updates available it notifies you. It is so easy to update. Just restart the computer and it will automatically install updates.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic price for a very capable little machine
Reviews.Author: JON S BOEHM
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something to replace my aging Dell Mini 10V netbook.  The C720 does perfectly. Nice size and weight and very speedy.  Love the refurb price point.

Reviews.Title: Cool little notebook
Reviews.Author: Phil R. Cranston
Reviews.Content: Awesome little light notebook for browsing Netflix YouTube and Google doc.  Son's middle school moved to teaching goggle doc this year over word

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: bobbi lee johnson
Reviews.Content: i am very happy with this works great its fast and does everything i want and need just wish it has a place to put c.d's in

Reviews.Title: Small and speedy
Reviews.Author: Mary R.
Reviews.Content: I don't do heavy gaming and graphic things.  I needed word processing and web browsing.  This little thing is perfect.  Boots up so fast that I don't have time to fetch a cup of coffee while I wait for it like I did with my windows operating system.  I'm still figuring a few things out here and there and the keyboard is a bit more compact so I have be most diligent in making sure I have my fingers on the right keys but it is really great!!!  I did buy a mouse to go with it though because I just don't do so well with those finger pads but it could be that it is because I had gotten so used to having a mouse. Anyway, highly recommended for someone who doesn't need all the bells and whistles of a high speed gaming machine.  If you want something that is very portable with excellent battery life and  doesn't cost too much this could be perfect for you too!

Reviews.Title: I THINK ITS GREAT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Garrett Van Tassel
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer as an upgrade to my old IBM laptop which did not work very well any more online.I had no problem setting it up, It was just like working with my old device running XP. getting help for almost any problem is just a click away. If you can't  find the answer in the computer there are forums out there for you to go to.you can even email google for help. I have not found any thing that I don't like about this machine. When you get one just got to the built in help and try to learn something every day about your chromebook. then go to youtube and check out the videos on your model. I have had my c720 about 3 weeks now. I recommend this for just about anybody. I am 61 and I had no problem making the switch from XP to Chromebook. I only regret not making the switch sooner.

Reviews.Title: loving it!
Reviews.Author: C. Conciatori
Reviews.Content: I have had my chromebook for about a month now and I'm loving it.  I especially love the fast bootup (as that was one of the reasons that I wasn't using my old laptop).  It's so light, but have not encountered anything I can't do on it that I normally do on my old laptop.  Overall I am very happy with my purchase and am using this as my main computer.

Reviews.Title: acer chromebook
Reviews.Author: olddice
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed, I cannot say enough for the price and the product. You will not be sorry if you purchase this product.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Louise Bastarache
Reviews.Content: Chrome book works a little diffidently. It has apps. I like it very much so far. Have to use the "enter bottom on the keyboard after signing in. No enter on the screen. That was confusing. It turns on very quick. For the price, it is good. I don't use it for a lot of functions. I like my ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: D.Juelfs
Reviews.Content: great product for school and work. Very light and compact with an amazing battery. Highly recommended if looking for a reliable laptop.

Reviews.Title: nice bang for buck
Reviews.Author: Leroy Hill
Reviews.Content: Does most everything needed.  Setting up printer and scanners are a pain in the ...  Other than that an excellent laptop.

Reviews.Title: I have to get use to Chrome OS
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Parker
Reviews.Content: I like it, but I am still getting use to the chrome OS. I had no idea that it is a lot different than what I am use to - Windows OS. I am getting help from my granddaughter who has knowledge of learning about the Chrome/Cloud OS in computer class at School. It is still a bit of a challenge for me but I am learning

Reviews.Title: great delivery
Reviews.Author: Lanisha
Reviews.Content: Everything is Great I haven't used the laptop yet i bought it for my son's birthday in may im sure he will love it

Reviews.Title: The best performing chromebook for the money
Reviews.Author: D. ALGER
Reviews.Content: This is not a laptop - it is a small, cheap device that let's my kids learn and play online.I chose this chromebook over other cheap ones because it has a real computer processor and not a smart phone processor so it performs really well even when loading the largest google documents / presentations.I also chose a chromebook over a real laptop because I don't want my kids installing viruses and messing it up all the time.  I spend no time cleaning them off and they each have exactly what they need to get their school work done and nothing more.You can also print to any printer hooked up to a PC running special software though I recommend getting a printer with wireless capabilities built in if you don't already have one.  Brother Printer HL3140CW is a great color laser printer with built in wireless at a good price.  Search for 'Google Cloud Print' to learn more

Reviews.Title: Great couch computer - suits our needs very well
Reviews.Author: Travis Kline
Reviews.Content: We purchased this to be a second computer for our family and are very happy with the results. It is thin and light and has a great battery and does everything we need. Make sure you know about the Chrome OS and what it can and cannot do before you buy this. I did my research and for our needs - basic web surfing, YouTube videos, basic computer gaming for the kids - it does very well.The one thing I miss is a backlit keyboard. My work Macbook has this function and when the lights are down or someone is watching a movie not having lit keys makes it hard to type. But for $200 you cannot expect to get everything.

Reviews.Title: A fantastic little laptop.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Jared Stoehr
Reviews.Content: When I first started college, the laptop that I decided to buy was around 8 pounds.  While it was a beast of a laptop, and I could use it for playing video games really well, it was not too portable and I didn't like carrying it around.This year I decided to get one of these just for school and was blown away by how useful it it.  The battery lasts a very long time, it's usually only around halfway discharged after a full day of classes.  I use it for taking notes, listening to music, browsing the internet, watching movies and shows on Netflix - basically anything you could want out of an ultraportable laptop like this.  One of my favorite features of it is the HDMI port.  It's a breeze to pick out a movie on Neflix and just hook this little guy up to the TV to watch it.One of the drawbacks is that the ChromeOS isn't the most open operating system, but if you don't need this computer to do anything too crazy, this laptop is perfect.  Also, there are many sources that show how you can install a version of Linux on the it, which I personally have done and enjoy very much.

Reviews.Title: ACER C720 Chromebook
Reviews.Author: doknik
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted for surfing internet, e-mail.  Lighting fast and about as light as my Kindle Fire. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Great value, Great portability
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I just recently bought this Chromebook , but so far I like this Chromebook. I've only had it for a couple of days so I can't comment on the longevity of the product. I was lucky enough to get the Chromebook for $149.99. The laptop is very light and like other people have said, the battery will lasts upwards of 7-8 hours (depending on what you are doing). The laptop itself is thin but with a solid body. The body does not flex and the screen does not shake or move when you are typing. The keyboard is smaller than a full sized laptop but still very comfortable to use. The mouse pad is sensitive and has a built in button design.So far the Chromebook meets all my expectations. It is not a full size laptop , but it will do 90% of what a laptop will do. Given the great value and portability of this chromebook I highly recommend it as a backup or even a primary laptop.I've only had this for a week so I can't speak on its longevity , but I will update later on.

Reviews.Title: Acer C720
Reviews.Author: Barb Blackford
Reviews.Content: Actually it was a gift for my sister.  She loves the convince of the size, the weight and the 8 !/2 hour battery!  It does everything that her old computer did, but faster and with more ease.  Actually, when my computer dies, I will replace it with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Acer C720 Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Bill A
Reviews.Content: My wife really likes her new Acer C720 Chromebook she states that is much lighter to hold then our laptop. My wife has had no problems surfing the net.

Reviews.Title: My wife and I love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Donald Walker
Reviews.Content: The Acer C720 Chromebook is a great piece of technology. If you can live without software that has to be installed on a computer and only use apps and plugins that work with the Google Chrome browser - and there are a lot. This is a great $200 solution.As long as Google will continue to support Chromebooks for a few years, this purchase will have been well worth it.

Reviews.Title: C720 Acer
Reviews.Author: ILWeber "Lotus"
Reviews.Content: It definitely gets an A+  It is exactly what i was looking for. It gets the job done fast! I am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: browse internet
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: to browse the internet and video quality I give 4.5 out of 5 on speed if you have a old computer no comparasion I ordered to replace my windows xp think I made a good purchase this item tends to get all good reviews on youtube and websites I visited before ordering a must buy unless you have bad vision I would say this and all tablets for example my 80 year old stepdad but a great buy for anybody else acer exactly gets some of the better reviews of the chromebooks out there hooks up to tv but have to change the video quality for that easy to do once you figure it out

Reviews.Title: Simple and Fast
Reviews.Author: Christian
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife. She loves it and when I asked her if she'd rather have a Macbook Air, she said no, she'd rather have this because if she drops it, she wouldn't feel bad. I can't complain. I've used it quite extensively as well. I can say that it's blazing fast. I have seen no speed issues and battery is very substantial - 2 full length movies on a full charge and some.

Reviews.Title: Great little laptop
Reviews.Author: S. Day
Reviews.Content: I didn't know what to think about Chromebooks at first, but after having one for a while, I have to admit that it's pretty neat!

Reviews.Title: Love this device!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Shopper
Reviews.Content: Recently sold an Asus Transformer with keyboard that was used for a couple of years and took the proceeds to purchase this via the Acer store as a refurb - EXCELLENT purchase!  The whole computing experience is even better than the Android tablet.  Don't get me wrong - Android on my phone is wonderful but when it comes to a larger device, where I tend to do/expect a little more, this Chromebook more than surpasses expectations.Chromebooks offer a computing experience, in my opinion, that closely mirror what one is already familiar with in a traditional PC environment - operation of the hardware, software functionality and overall familiarity make for a small learning curve.  I really also like that you can work offline with it - to an extent.  I've used it only once offline and that was to continue working on a document - it was a success.The Acer C720 is overall well designed.  It is thin, lightweight and they keyboard is comfortable to use - especially those of us who are old-school typists :) .  The screen is fine enough - this is at basic hardware and thus you have to expect some areas to be cost cutting.  However, the whole package makes for a great experience.Google is only going to improve the Chrome OS and these devices are going to continue reaping the benefits of those improvements.  Matched to Acer's hardware design and low-cost, they have a hit.  I can see why Chromebooks are picking up in popularity - lightweight, fast, easy to use and reasonable price now brings computing closer to what people as me want.  (I work in IT and believe me, LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the simplicity of this thing - I get sooooooo tired of babysitting technology, fixing its many issues at times.)I'm extremely pleased and look forward to using this Chromebook for the next several years.

Reviews.Title: Simply Awesome.
Reviews.Author: Anna Foley
Reviews.Content: Honestly I wasn't expecting much when I bought this. But it simply blew my expectations out of the water! It's fast, compact, and does exactly what I need it to. While it does suck to not have Skype and such, all of its apps make it very easy to use. Its battery life is just amazing, too. I highly recommend it to anyone who just needs something more than a phone to access the internet and have fun with on the go!

Reviews.Title: Does everything expected.
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: This is such a neat and cute computer for the price. It is very small! I would only recommend this laptop for children who might be inexperienced with computers and might damage it, or travelers. If you plan on using programs like Microsoft Office this computer can never be a full replacement. For the price though there's no way this computer could receive less than 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Lobolee
Reviews.Content: I needed a high speed portable computer with a HDMI port to be able to watch programs on my television.This filled that need. I also love being online within seconds of flipping it open. So much better that a tablet I got two years ago.

Reviews.Title: Great little machine
Reviews.Author: Mattb2jp "Matt"
Reviews.Content: Simple to use and understand, this machine has converted me to using the cloud. The battery life is awesome. While not perfect, the speakers are adequate for most of my listening needs, although I do use headphones sometimes. Very quick boot-up. A few items I have downloaded to the hard drive have handled well.

Reviews.Title: OK FOR BASIC INTERNET SURFING BUT ITS NOT A LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: Not good as far i can figure out for creating/storing documents or uploading video to youtube or sharing photos via email, you have to try and find then download apps to do the most basic things.I bought this for my wife she hates it because of the above, she gives it one star rating.If you want out the box internet surfing and basic email use then this will be ideal for you, but if you want more then i would put your $200 towards a decent laptop and save yourself hours of frustration searching for illusive apps.Over all as a internet surfing note book its great value i love its size and speed for surfing the net although i was expecting it to be a small laptop as it is listed under computers and it looks like a laptop so i expected a laptop, my mistake i guess but an easy mistake to make if your not bang up to date techno savy.So my conclusion its a great note book but its not a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Great system combination.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Was curious about what all the fuss was with chromeOS and the Acer C720 chromebook so I bought one. Unbelievably fast. The C720 is the best notebook I have tried and I have tried several and the battery is fantastic, charge it overnight and use the machine all day. Almost all the apps/programs you will ever need are pre-installed and I added three or four additional programs very, very easily from the playstore. ChromeOS works flawlessly and fast. Did I mention that this is a great system combination?So why did I give it to my daughter? Because I love to tinker with LinuxOS and different distros and you can't do that with ChromeOS. That is this Systems strength and why it is such a great System but I like to tinker with systems. Unfortunately I break a lot of toys but still I like to tinker.

Reviews.Title: Best laptop yet!
Reviews.Author: Ng Guo Loong
Reviews.Content: Pro:- Does everything as advertised- Incredibly fast start up and shut down times.- Set up and ready to user almost instantly.- Light and ultra portable.- Great price- Great touch padCons:- Screen could be a little bit better and still quite good for its price.

Reviews.Title: A+
Reviews.Author: Jason Romero
Reviews.Content: fast shipping in great shape im happy with this acer product. A+ im very happy with performance of this laptop

Reviews.Title: i loves it.
Reviews.Author: William T Keller
Reviews.Content: You basically can't do anything that isn't browser based. However, I love the crap out of this little laptop for everything that is browser based. It literally lasts for >8 hours of active use. I wouldn't want a different chromebook, even for the same price. (If you code or play games this obviously will have to supplement your pc, not replace)

Reviews.Title: Is doing what I had expected
Reviews.Author: Charles P Cover
Reviews.Content: Meets my everyday needs for traveling and going to meetings.  Also enjoy searching for all the free apps that are out there.

Reviews.Title: Not for everyone.
Reviews.Author: Lyric
Reviews.Content: Good product...easy to use and lightweight (great for travel)...however, lacks cd drive, etc. Should be your 2nd laptop instead of your primary computer.

Reviews.Title: very solid chromebook choice for the price
Reviews.Author: Ryan Burnett
Reviews.Content: pretty much everything i expected in a chromebook.battery life is better than i thought it would be. Was able to stream march madness games for a solid 6 hours before having to charge it back up.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Rockadopalous
Reviews.Content: I got this little puppy for my parents and they love it. I will get one when my computer from college dies. Small, lightweight and does everything I would need now that I am out of school.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this computer. The images are sharp and crisp. The speed is great and it is compact. The battery life is amazing. I would recommend this computer.Oh and by the way Amazon shipped this next day!!!

Reviews.Title: A great search engine
Reviews.Author: conrad lai
Reviews.Content: This is great affordable search engine for the web, it'response time is very fast . I like to use it  to watch You Tube it is great!

Reviews.Title: Excellent For the Price
Reviews.Author: Matt ford
Reviews.Content: Very light and portable.  Great for media and web browsing.  I wanted an Ipad but didn't feel like paying the extra $300.  In fact the chromebook, because it runs full webapps and not mobile versions, is in many ways more powerful than an Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Sheppard
Reviews.Content: For me, this computer is perfect. Just the correct size and weight. I can easily take it with me  wherever I go. All I do is touch the pad and it quickly goes to the site I have requested! Love it!

Reviews.Title: better than expected
Reviews.Author: Anthony Martinetti
Reviews.Content: We have an imac, macpro, nook, and ipad - weren't sure how the Acer would fit in  - but it has done well.  As others have noted, don't expect it to be your 1st computer, but it works well and is easy to understand - as intuitive as our Apple machines.  No complaints, in fact we are quite pleased.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Nile Dacre
Reviews.Content: This does exactly what I wanted it for. Web browsing and portable video/music playback. A second screen when I'm using my PC for something fullscreen.The professional reviews seem to mark down the chromebooks for not doing things that I wouldn't expect from it. If you're interested in the getting a chromebook, just look up the available features and check out what's in the Chrome app store. It will do all of these things really well. If you need something that isn't available, the the chromebook is not for you.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I need
Reviews.Author: M. Milsap
Reviews.Content: This does everything I need it to do and it does it perfectly. Very light and seems I'll get about 6 hours on a charge with full brightness and lots of exts/apps installed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Chromebook!
Reviews.Author: M. Barland
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife to replace her reliance on a failing, old full-size laptop with a bad battery. She loves this C720P. It's fast, boots up in a few seconds, does everything a light web surfer would want (even basic document editing), and has a tremendous battery. I feel like we've been spoiled by the always ready, long battery life of the iPad. This C720P is as close to that quality of all day long use as you'll get in a laptop.The automatic updates are a plus, so I don't really have to think much about it.And the best part? No Windows 8!I've never used the touchscreen version, but that's the only thing that seems lacking here. I would think that the upgrade would be worth it and am looking to get another one with a touchscreen to supplement the wife's C720P.

Reviews.Title: Great Internet Computer
Reviews.Author: Jerry W. Barnett
Reviews.Content: If you just want to browse the Internet, read email, view Facebook, etc. this computer is a very viable alternative to an Ipad or other tablets. I have been using an Ipad for these purposes for a long time and I assure you this computer compares very favorably to the Ipad. I like that it has a "real" keyboard, starts quickly, and does all that I typically want to do on the Internet. While I have a regular laptop computer, as well as a desktop computer, I am sure this computer will get the most daily use. Considering the low cost of this computer, it is clearly the "most cost efficient" way to accomplish all the things that most people want to do on the Internet.

Reviews.Title: Great value but there are limitations
Reviews.Author: Andre
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my in laws so they would get a user friendly platform.  We are using Verizon's MIFI to provide the internet connectivity.  That part was easy...The hard part is trying to get a printer connected. Google uses Cloud Print which is a good idea but because we have a low budget solution, that is no WIFI in the house, it becomes a major project.  You cannot just use a cable to connect a printer because chrome books don't let you use printer drivers.So the process requires you to first register the printer with either MAC OS or Windows based computer on a network.  Once you have registered the printer, you may also need a range extender or router you can use to connect the printer and then have the router connect to the Jetpack...gone are the days of plugging in the printer...

Reviews.Title: Great Asset
Reviews.Author: David Hayes
Reviews.Content: I had no idea that the Chromebook would be the missing link in my business (Realtor). I have cut my Listing Presentation down from 30-45 minutes to 15 minutes allowing more time to discuss preparation for the market.

Reviews.Title: This is a good buy!!!!
Reviews.Author: Rome
Reviews.Content: I love this chrome book its awsome Im glad i made this purchased this product . its slim,compact,and very quick no laggin... its worth the money no complaints here also im happy with the battery life...

Reviews.Title: Acer Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This has been by far the best small laptop I have bought! It is light, and battery life is amazing! I do not have to worry about carrying my charger everywhere. It is great for traveling and all browser based (which I love). I am glad I purchased this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Why I answered this way
Reviews.Author: Laura Fry
Reviews.Content: I am not Tech smart and it did not come with any sort of directions.  I am still trying to figure how to use it.  Fortunately I have a couple of friends that have been able to help me some.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Larry Hophan
Reviews.Content: I got this chromebook for someone in my family and before I gave it to him I set it up and tested it a bit. It is extremely fast and well worth the $199 he paid for it. I like it so much I may have to get one for myself

Reviews.Title: Great Machine. Fastest ever
Reviews.Author: ROBERT HAWKINS
Reviews.Content: I purchased an 11" chromebook from Fry's three months ago.It is amazing.  Runs extreemly fast.  It will do anything my HP desktop does.It takes a little getting used to.  You have to convert some of your word files to google files etc but it'snot a problem. and you can call up your google files on your other computers since they are stored in the cloud.You have to use apps developed for google, but there seems to be an adequate supply.I can easily see this becomming my primary computer.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer!
Reviews.Author: truk1127
Reviews.Content: Despite it's cheap price, this computer is great!  It is super fast, lightweight, has great battery life, and does everything I need without any issues.  This computer does exactly what it is intended to.

Reviews.Title: Very good buy
Reviews.Author: Wayne Klawuhn
Reviews.Content: I like it very much. Has done everything that it said it would. Is the fastest thing that I ever used on the internet.I would recommend to anyone that wants email, using the internet, all but Microsoft office.

Reviews.Title: i reallly really love it
Reviews.Author: Jose Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This is the best thing i have ever bay easy to use and very fast, i love it , and i recoment it

Reviews.Title: Wonderful for college student
Reviews.Author: Wei Yi
Reviews.Content: only for 199, and most work can be done with this tiny but powerful machine. can do 80% of Macbook air's job.easy to carry with, and long-life battery(use a whole day)the only problem is that for PDF, it can't read very wellHighly suggested.

Reviews.Title: Love at first sight
Reviews.Author: garyedavidson
Reviews.Content: What is not to like about Acer? I have had an Acer netbook now for years (Aspire One) and have enjoyed the portability just like this C720. The battery life is unsurpassed and the screen quality is perfect. Instant on is a plus when using this to work on wireless networks and the dual band wireless makes it fly through the internet on the 5 gigahertz band. Wireless N works great also and it works with older G. You get 100 gigabytes of Google Drive storage free for two years when you purchase this product. Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids and anyone who does basic office work! I could see businesses moving towards this.
Reviews.Author: Waldo
Reviews.Content: First, let's acknowledge that this is NOT a Windows-based PC. Think of it more like your smartphone, but with a larger screen, keyboard and mouse. It has a small amount of internal memory you can use to install "Apps". Most of the Apps require an Internet connection to operate, but there is SOME support for offline work.For "Office Productivity", there is Google Docs instead of Word, Google Sheets instead of Excel and Google Slides instead of PowerPoint. It's able to convert back and forth between the Microsoft Office formats. All are surprisingly full featured.The best part is that, you can't mess the machine up. If you happen to configure anything wrong, you can simply "Powerwash" the device, reboot, sign into your Google account and all of your apps and settings are instantly restored.I bought this for my daughter. She loves it. It's perfect for her schoolwork. Everything she does is saved in Google Drive (cloud storage), so it's available from anywhere and I don't have to worry about backing it up. My wife, who is sick of her Windows PC (mostly because it's constantly popping up alerts that she needs to install patches or update her anti-virus definitions) wants one now as well.I've talked to a view people that are considering moving most of their company to something like this. Cheaper device, cheaper licensing, lower maintenance overhead, etc...

Reviews.Title: Acer C720 Chromebook

This noise has been a consistent occurrence, but does not detract from it's original intents and purposes.4 stars overall, 5 if just didn't have that noise problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Replacement for a Tablet
Reviews.Author: Brian From MN
Reviews.Content: Over the past year I've had an iPad, an HD+ Nook, and a Samsung Tab 3.  What I liked about tablets, compared with a full-fledged laptop, was the instant-on availability, and all-day battery.  This Chromebook has both, plus it has a decent keyboard that I was missing on the tablets.  I use the Chromebook for web surfing, and since I don't play games I don't miss all the apps; there's a website for everything I need.  I have the 2GB RAM version, and I haven't had any noticeable degradation in performance.  I frequently have 5-10 tabs open at a time.  As for the touch pad, it took a getting use to, but after several weeks I really liked it.  The only problem is trying to select large blocks of text can be tricky.  The screen isn't as good as most laptops, but for a couple hundred dollars it isn't bad.  One thing that's really nice is there's no function keys, and they're replaced by very useful buttons like contrast, volume, refresh etc..  Overall I'm extremely happy with this Chromebook.
